==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=敖仓}}

===Etymology===
The Aocang Granary was built on top of [[北邙山|Mount Mang]] during the [[w:Qin Dynasty|Qin Dynasty]] for the purpose of storing grains and cereals. Later on, this term came to refer to [[granaries]] in [[general]].
